page.title: 03Village tracks
page.content: The ancient track called the Ridgeway and an old railway track go through the village. There are also a lot of footpaths in and around Ogbourne St George village. The Ridgeway was used in prehistoric times. Many people come through the village to explore the Ridgeway. The railway was closed more than 20 years ago.Nowadays people take their dogs along the railway track and people ride horses and motorbikes along it. It is now a good nature reserve for plants and insects. The footpaths are used by children as safe places to play.They are popular with hikers. People in the village use them as short cuts.
